thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: dani leggett

author: dani leggett
title: dani leggett
text: This has always been one of my favorite screen printing suppliers. They always have every thing I need! Up until somewhat recently, they would have gotten a 5 out of 5 stars. However, the ryonet membership is stupid. I refuse to join for $200 a year to save a couple of bucks. If the savings are that great then why charge people a yearly subscription.
